plot: When Joanne meets Eric she develops a game of seduction which is based upon the rules of the game of draughts. Two games of strategy that have much more in common than we would have thought in the first place.
title: Le jeu de dames
plot_es: When Joanne meets Eric she develops a game of seduction which is based upon the rules of the game of draughts. Two games of strategy that have much more in common than we would have thought in the first place.
plot_en: When Joanne meets Eric she develops a game of seduction which is based upon the rules of the game of draughts. Two games of strategy that have much more in common than we would have thought in the first place.
